name: Transition Offense
kpi: Ball crosses half court in four seconds or less
description: Relentless pace, advantage before defense sets

name: Transition Defense
description: Slow opponent, set defense, prevent fast breaks

name: Halfcourt Offense
intent: End Dominoes With Gold or Silver
description: Create/maintain advantage, finish with best shot

name: Halfcourt Defense
description: Force bad shots, disrupt rhythm, win ball back
